images.caption: Figure 1:MCTS tree we have constructed for geometry problem datasets (e.g., MAVIS-Geometry). One path in the tree yields a correct result, while the remaining paths result in incorrect answers. It is worth noting that we use ellipses to omit some nodes in the original MCTS tree for better presentation.
